result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Tampering w/ a Global Positioning System Tracking Device

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt:
2:32 PM Defendant Allan Dean Owens appeared by video from the Pepin County jail with Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder in court.  Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Schroeder WTL for PH and requests 12/6.  He's waiting for his revocation packet.  Court finds Mr. Owens on advise of counsel WTL for PH.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on December 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:34 PM Defendant Allan Dean Owens appeared by video from the Pepin County Jail with counsel Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder  by video.  Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin.   Mr. Schroeder WTL for PH.  Mr. Owens had a revocation hearing and believe State will adjourn until revocation is done.  Mr. Seifert agrees.  Mr. Owens reports revocation scheduled on the 28th.  Court finds Mr. Owens on advise of counsel WTL for PH.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 4, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on October 4, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

1:54 PM Defendant Allan Dean Owens appeared by video with Attorney Nicholis J Schroeder appeared by video.   Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin.  Mr. Schroeder is his attorney, received discovery, WTL for PH and ask STC on 9/6.  Court finds on advise of counsel Mr. Owens cont'd to WTL for PH.  Mr. Owens you also need to be fingerprinted.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 6, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

records.addlTxt:
1:36 PM Defendant Allan Dean Owens appeared by video from the Pepin County Jail with Attorney Schroeder of PD office by video.  Attorney Jon D. Seifert appeared by phone for State of Wisconsin. Court advised defendant of charges, penalties and rights.  Court advises defendant of right to PH w/in 10 days in custody, 20 days if not.  The PD is seeking an attorney for Mr. Owens.  Mr. Owens WTL for PH.  Mr. Owens on a PO hold.  Mr. Owens needs to be fingerprinted.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
